data.text: Joshua the son of Gr. Nave.  Nun was valiant in war,
How was he glorified in the lifting up his hands,
Who before him so stood fast?
Did not the sun go back by his hand?
He called upon the Most High and  Mighty One,
With hailstones of mighty power
Also in the time of Moses he did a work of mercy,
And of six hundred thousand people on foot, they two alone were preserved
Also the Lord gave strength unto Caleb,
That all the children of Israel might see
Also the judges, every one by his name,
May their bones flourish again out of their place,
Samuel, the prophet of the Lord, beloved of his Lord,
By the law of the Lord he judged the congregation,
By his faithfulness he was proved to be a prophet,
Also when his enemies pressed him round about
And the Lord thundered from heaven,
And he utterly destroyed the rulers of the Tyrians,
Also before the time of his Gr. age-long sleep.  long sleep
And after he fell asleep he prophesied,
